code: import*as actions from'./actionTypes';import axios from'axios';export var fetchPhotoRequest=function fetchPhotoRequest(){return{type:actions.FETCH_PHOTO_REQUEST};};export var fetchPhotoSuccess=function fetchPhotoSuccess(photos){return{type:actions.FETCH_PHOTO_SUCCESS,payload:photos};};export var fetchPhotoFailure=function fetchPhotoFailure(error){return{type:actions.FETCH_PHOTO_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var fetchPhotos=function fetchPhotos(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchPhotoRequest);axios.get('https://www.breakingbadapi.com/api/characters?limit=20').then(function(response){var photos=response.data;dispatch(fetchPhotoSuccess(photos));}).catch(function(error){var errorMessage=error.message;dispatch(fetchPhotoFailure(errorMessage));});};};
